key.name: api-providers
key.description: JSON string containing API provider configurations

key.name: current-provider
key.description: Name of the currently selected API provider

key.name: show-indicator
key.description: Whether to show the panel indicator

key.name: auto-update
key.description: Whether to automatically update the extension

key.name: proxy-host
key.description: Proxy server hostname or IP address

key.name: proxy-port
key.description: Proxy server port number

key.name: notifications-enabled
key.description: Whether to enable Claude Code hooks notifications

key.name: hook-normal-exit
key.description: Show notifications when Claude Code exits normally (exit code 0)

key.name: hook-abnormal-exit
key.description: Show notifications when Claude Code exits abnormally (non-zero exit codes)

key.name: normal-exit-message
key.description: Custom message to display when Claude Code exits normally

key.name: abnormal-exit-message
key.description: Custom message to display when Claude Code exits abnormally

key.name: hook-notification
key.description: Show notifications when Claude Code sends notifications (e.g., waiting for input)

key.name: telegram-enabled
key.description: Enable Telegram push notifications (reserved for future use)

key.name: telegram-bot-token
key.description: Telegram bot token for push notifications (reserved for future use)

key.name: telegram-chat-id
key.description: Telegram chat ID for push notifications (reserved for future use)

key.name: notification-hook-message
key.default: 'Claude Code is waiting for input or has sent a notification.'
key.description: Custom message to display when Claude Code sends notifications

key.name: custom-hook-commands
key.description: JSON string containing custom hook commands for different events

key.name: notification-sound-enabled
key.description: Whether to play sound with notifications

key.name: notification-sound-file
key.description: Path to custom notification sound file

key.name: notification-urgency
key.description: Urgency level for notifications (low, normal, critical)

key.name: notification-timeout
key.description: Timeout for notifications in milliseconds (0 for no timeout)
